hero.title: Digital Freedom Now.
hero.content: Swarm is a decentralised data storage and distribution technology. Ready to power the next generation of censorship-resistant, unstoppable, serverless dapps.
hero.quote: “If Ethereum is the world’s CPU, Swarm is the world’s Hard Drive” - Viktor Tron

unstoppable.tagline: Privacy for individuals ↔ Trust for the data economy
unstoppable.title: Unstoppable data
unstoppable.content: Swarm continues where the blockchain ends, making the world computer real.

features.title: Open & Borderless
features.content: Swarm is open source code, limited only by the people who use and maintain it - Join a community building the future of the web.

features.title: Fault-tolerant
features.content: Redundant storage with local replication ensures data availability even in the face of node dropouts or data loss.

features.title: No downtime
features.content: Swarm is decentralised and distributed, and so it’s also always up, making it stable and reliable.

features.title: Privacy first
features.content: Swarm nodes provide cryptographic support enabling you to use network in an unrestricted way while building blocks like “Single-owner-chunks” enable extraordinary zero-leak privacy.

features.title: DDOS resistant
features.content: Swarm network is fully decentralised peer-to-peer network while it’s resilience against DDoS grows with every additional node in the network.

features.title: Credible neutrality
features.content: Swarm is built to not discriminate - it’s in the very nature of our design, and permeates throughout our mission.

wikipedia.content: Wikipedia Prize has successfully concluded. More bounties to follow soon!

develop.title: Develop fast and free
develop.content: Swarm provides a complete stack of essential base layer components for developers. Create and host dApps, NFT meta-data, and media files decentralised!

tabs.title: Bee
tabs.content: Bee is a peer-to-peer client that connects you with other peers all over the world to become part of Swarm network, a global distributed p2p storage network that aims to store and distribute all of the world's data.

tabs.title: Bee.js
tabs.content: Bee-js is Bee’s complementary JavaScript library. It’s the technology underpinning the swarm-cli and bee- dashboard tools and is a powerful tool for building completely decentralised apps with just a few lines of code.

tabs.title: Swarm-CLI
tabs.content: Manage your Bee node and interact with the Swarm network in the command line. Upload and download files, folders and websites, as well as easily manage different feeds, identities, and nodes. Convenient access to even Swarm's more advanced features - including easier devops, postage stamps management from the command line, and other automation.

tabs.title: Bee API
tabs.content: The Bee API provides a HTTP interface with a rich set of endpoints for accessing data on the network - manage your node resources and get operational metrics and insights.

fairdata.title: Fair Data Protocol
fairdata.content: Fair data protocol enables a fairer data economy that promotes human rights through privacy, digital sovereignty, and data interoperability, and allows developers to focus on building their dapps rather than reinventing data stores.

dapp.title: Your decentralised web3 dapp in 4 steps

features.title: 1. Fork on GitHub
features.content: Find a forkable project that should be decentralised or extended.

features.title: 2. Connect to FDP
features.content: Extend it with the Fair data protocol so that users have their data saved in their private data store.

features.title: 3. Upload to Swarm
features.content: Once hosted on Swarm it becomes accessible to all, with essentially zero hosting costs for developers.

features.title: 4. Grow through FDP
features.content: Submit requests to be added in Fairdrive’s dapp store and make it available to existing Fairdrive users.

news.title: Swarm Desktop App - Web3 for everyone
news.copy: The Swarm Foundation unveiled the beta version of the Swarm Desktop App (Beta). Its goal is to take the best from Web2 and replace the complex experience of Web3 with a familiar one.

builders.tagline: One Swarm, united in PLUR, guided by virtue
builders.title: Build on Swarm
builders.content: Swarm grants and online events support many interesting projects that are already building their products on top of Swarm.

features.title: Etherna
features.content: Etherna is a transparent video platform FOR EVERYONE where freedom of speech is incentivized, not convicted.

features.title: Dapplets
features.content: Dapplets aims to leverage target websites’ search results to pull data previously uploaded to Swarm, providing an interface for data interchange between the Dapplet and the search result provider.

features.title: Copyright Delta
features.content: Copyright Delta is building the Digital Rights Exchange & Network (DRX) which allows users to control their data and decide who has access to it. DRX also enables tokenised management of royalties, licensing and ownership.

features.title: Metaprovide
features.content: Metaprovide has implemented a Nextcloud plugin that enables users to interact with Swarm storage directly in Nextcloud Files bringing Nextcloud users closer to the vision of a decentralized future.

millions.title: Build on Swarm
millions.content: Imagine a society where human rights are respected and your data is not used against you to influence what you think.Explore the power of art, blockchain, and games and help create a fair, ethical, private, censorship-free, permissionless and unstoppable Web3. Join other like-minded artists, gamers, developers, activists, and crypto-enthusiasts, as well as curious and knowledgeable souls.

bounties.title: Bounties for impact
bounties.content: Swarm Bounties are a call to action for experts from various fields to contribute their knowledge and expertise, so we can move closer to a fairer data society.

features.title: Bounty #1
features.content: Develop a censorship resistant blog architecture.

features.title: Bounty #2
features.content: Implement a subgraph to obtain BZZ price data.

features.title: Bounty #3
features.content: Integrate Social Archive and Dapplets to allow data to be found.
